TopicTitle: Add incremental Authority Limiter adjustment to Action/Axis-Groups

Articles.Content:
Hello, 

Now that breaking Ground gave us electric motors, much people will build electric planes and helicopters.

The most common rotor blades are actually control surfaces like the elevons, because the angle can be adjusted in flight by using "deploy" and "authority limiter" in the parts menu.

It would be verry cool, if we could not only "toggle deploy", but also can adjust the deploy angle, by using "incremental control" for the authority limiter like there is on these new electric parts.

This is especially required if a helicopter or plane has more than one rotor, because it would get out of balance when adjusting them one by one throug the parts menu.

 

Pretty sure this will help a lot of players.

Thank you

I agree with this.

But for us stock builders as well. Using ... maybe radio?
